title: 697: PAYPAL’S U.K. CUSTOMERS CAN NOW BUY, SELL, AND HODL BITCOIN!!!! ETHEREUM EYES $6.5K TARGET!!!!
description:
Global payments giant PayPal disclosed on Friday that its customers in the United Kingdom can now buy, sell, and hold multiple cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), directly from their accounts.

“We are delighted to share that all eligible customers in the UK can now buy, hold, and sell Cryptocurrencies Bitcoin & Ethereum from their PayPal accounts."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Global payments giant PayPal disclosed on Friday that its customers in the United Kingdom can now buy, sell, and hold multiple cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), directly from their accounts. “We are delighted to share that all eligible customers in the UK can now buy, hold, and sell Cryptocurrencies Bitcoin & Ethereum from their PayPal accounts."
